divs: sighting detailsat approximately 2:30am friday september 26, 2008 i witnessed a v shaped air craft flying horizontal i would guess at around 500 feet. it could have been triangle shaped but from what i could tell it was a v. it had 5 lights that were very dull and not blinking or changing colors. one light was right behind the front (point of v) and each side had two lights. these lights were all circular. this object and the lights on it could not be seen without my night vision scope. it was traveling to the south\south west at a steady speed which wasn't that fast. it made absolutely no noise. i see planes at all hours of the day and night here and they all make noise. this thing was completely silent. the total time i witnessed it was about 2 minutes or so. i then came inside the house and told my wife what i had seen. i will definitely be looking into getting a night vision\camera setup.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Baton Rouge
There were no other sightings in Baton Rouge on or around September 26th 2008
Summary: V Shaped Craft Seen Through Night Vision Scope
